channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Control Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Control Center

item.title: CVE-2021-20528|2024-09-17T02:32:37.225Z -- ibm -- control%20center
item.description: IBM Control Center 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 198761.
